Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent
local neigh = Instance.new("Sound") neigh.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=25697118" neigh.Parent = Tool.Handle neigh.Volume = 0.6
function makeRainbow(h, torso,rightLeg)
redBrick = Instance.new("Part")
lookVector = torso.CFrame.lookVector print(lookVector) lookAvg = math.abs(lookVector.x) + math.abs(lookVector.z) xLook = lookVector.x / lookAvg zLook = lookVector.z / lookAvg
reflect = 0.2
yellowBrick = Instance.new("Part") yellowBrick.Position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x + xLook,torso.Position.y - rightLeg.Size.y,torso.Position.z + zLook) yellowBrick.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright yellow") yellowBrick.Size = Vector3.new(5,1.2,2) yellowBrick.TopSurface = 0 yellowBrick.BottomSurface = 0 yellowBrick.Reflectance = reflect
yayRainbow = Instance.new("Sparkles") yayRainbow.Parent = yellowBrick
redBrick = Instance.new("Part") redBrick.Position = Vector3.new(yellowBrick.Position.x,yellowBrick.Position.y,yellowBrick.Position.z - 4) redBrick.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red") redBrick.Size = Vector3.new(5,1.2,2) redBrick.CFrame = CFrame.new(redBrick.Position,lookVector) redBrick.TopSurface = 0 redBrick.BottomSurface = 0 redBrick.Reflectance = reflect
orangeBrick = Instance.new("Part") orangeBrick.Position = Vector3.new(yellowBrick.Position.x,yellowBrick.Position.y,yellowBrick.Position.z - 2) orangeBrick.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright orange") orangeBrick.Size = Vector3.new(5,1.2,2) orangeBrick.TopSurface = 0 orangeBrick.BottomSurface = 0 orangeBrick.Reflectance = reflect
greenBrick = Instance.new("Part") greenBrick.Position = Vector3.new(yellowBrick.Position.x,redBrick.Position.y,yellowBrick.Position.z + 2) greenBrick.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green") greenBrick.Size = Vector3.new(5,1.2,2) greenBrick.TopSurface = 0 greenBrick.BottomSurface = 0 greenBrick.Reflectance = reflect
blueBrick = Instance.new("Part") blueBrick.Position = Vector3.new(yellowBrick.Position.x,yellowBrick.Position.y,yellowBrick.Position.z + 4) blueBrick.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue") blueBrick.Size = Vector3.new(5,1.2,2) blueBrick.TopSurface = 0 blueBrick.BottomSurface = 0 blueBrick.Reflectance = reflect
purpleBrick = Instance.new("Part") purpleBrick.Position = Vector3.new(yellowBrick.Position.x,yellowBrick.Position.y,yellowBrick.Position.z + 6) purpleBrick.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright purple") purpleBrick.Size = Vector3.new(5,1.2,2) purpleBrick.TopSurface = 0 purpleBrick.BottomSurface = 0 purpleBrick.Reflectance = reflect
h.Jump = true
RedOrangeWeld = Instance.new("Weld") RedOrangeWeld.Parent = redBrick RedOrangeWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0,0,2) RedOrangeWeld.Part0 = redBrick RedOrangeWeld.Part1 = orangeBrick
OrangeYellowWeld = Instance.new("Weld") OrangeYellowWeld.Parent = orangeBrick OrangeYellowWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0,0,2) OrangeYellowWeld.Part0 = orangeBrick OrangeYellowWeld.Part1 = yellowBrick
YellowGreenWeld = Instance.new("Weld") YellowGreenWeld.Parent = yellowBrick YellowGreenWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0,0,2) YellowGreenWeld.Part0 = yellowBrick YellowGreenWeld.Part1 = greenBrick
GreenBlueWeld = Instance.new("Weld") GreenBlueWeld.Parent = greenBrick GreenBlueWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0,0,2) GreenBlueWeld.Part0 = greenBrick GreenBlueWeld.Part1 = blueBrick
BluePurpleWeld = Instance.new("Weld") BluePurpleWeld.Parent = blueBrick BluePurpleWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0,0,2) BluePurpleWeld.Part0 = blueBrick BluePurpleWeld.Part1 = purpleBrick
rainbowBlock = Instance.new("Model") redBrick.Parent = rainbowBlock orangeBrick.Parent = rainbowBlock yellowBrick.Parent = rainbowBlock greenBrick.Parent = rainbowBlock blueBrick.Parent = rainbowBlock purpleBrick.Parent = rainbowBlock rainbowBlock.Parent = game.Workspace
rainbowMove(rainbowBlock,yellowBrick,torso,rightLeg)
end
function rainbowMove(rainbowBlock,yellowBrick,torso,rightLeg)
wait(0.1)
BodyPos = Instance.new("BodyPosition") BodyPos.position = Vector3.new(yellowBrick.Position.x, yellowBrick.Position.y + 20, yellowBrick.Position.z) BodyPos.P = 100000 BodyPos.D = 95000 BodyPos.maxForce = Vector3.new(0,100000,0) BodyPos.Parent = yellowBrick
BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.Parent = yellowBrick BodyGyro.cframe = yellowBrick.CFrame BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(10000,10000,10000) BodyGyro.P = 10000 BodyGyro.D = 500
wait(3)
lookVector = torso.CFrame.lookVector forceToUse = 2000 force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(forceToUse * lookVector.x, 17000,forceToUse * lookVector.z) BodyPos:remove() force.Parent = yellowBrick wait(2) force.force = Vector3.new(-(forceToUse * lookVector.x), 17000,-(forceToUse * lookVector.z)) wait(2) force.force = Vector3.new(0, 14000,0) wait(3) force:remove() wait(1) rainbowBlock:remove()
end
function onActivated()
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
neigh:Play()
local h = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h ~= nil then torso = h.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") rightLeg = h.Parent:FindFirstChild("Right Leg") end
makeRainbow(h,torso,rightLeg)
Tool.Enabled = true
end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)
